alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg; Northern Hidalgo; Starr; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 02 at 2:00PM CST until February 04 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 degrees possible. For the second Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 29 degrees possible. * WHERE...Kenedy, Willacy, Zapata, Jim Hogg, Brooks, Starr, and Northern Hidalgo Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Watch, from late Thursday night through Friday morning. For the second Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
